description:
Well becomes the disciple of Alfred the magician, steadily learning magic under his training. Meanwhile, Alfred warns him to keep his ability to use a magic a secret in order to avoid a succession dispute, but Well`s eldest brother Kurt begins to notice his talent for magic...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Succession Dispute? Are You Kidding Me?
Une lutte fratricide ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
お家騒動って, それはないでしょう!
